original_text: The inhabitants of Samaria shall fear because of the calves of Bethaven: for the people thereof shall mourn over it, and the priests thereof that rejoiced on it, for the glory thereof, because it is departed from it.
korean_text: 사마리아 주민이 벧아웬의 송아지로 말미암아 두려워할 것이라 그 백성이 슬퍼하며 그것을 기뻐하던 제사장들도 슬퍼하리니 이는 그의 영광이 떠나감이며

sentences.original_text: The inhabitants of Samaria shall fear
because of the calves of Bethaven
for the people thereof shall mourn over it
and the priests thereof that rejoiced on it
because it is departed from it
